name: energy-powder
effect: Used on a party Pokémon : Restores 50 HP. Decreases happiness by 5/5/10.

flavor_text.diamond_pearl: A very bitter medicine powder. It restores the HP of one Pokémon by 50 points.
flavor_text.platinum: A very bitter medicine powder. It restores the HP of one Pokémon by 50 points.
flavor_text.heartgold_soulsilver: A very bitter medicine powder. It restores the HP of one Pokémon by 50 points.
